noPerms: You do not have permissions for this command.
invalidUsername: The Minecraft username entered is invalid.
categoryNotFound: Could not get the $category category in the $command command.
noAccountChannel: This command is only available on account channels!
inactiveAccount: The account status cannot be changed if it is inactive. To remove inactivity use the /inactive command
commandError: There was an error in the command, check the console!

nick.accountExists: The entered account already exists in the database.
nick.invalidPrice: The price value cannot be 0 or negative.

embed.title: Account added to the system successfully
embed.description: The $name account was added to the database.

sold.description: Set an account to sold status
sold.success: The account status was set to SOLD successfully.

reserve.description: SSet or remove an account from reservation status
reserve.success: The account was successfully placed in reserve status.
reserve.removeReservation: The account was successfully returned to sale status.

inactive.description: Set or remove an account from inactive status
inactive.success: The account was successfully placed in inactive status.
inactive.removeInactivity: The inactive state was successfully removed. It is now in sale status.

embed.title: Account list
embed.description: There are currently $accounts accounts in the database.

buttons.previousLimit: You are already on the first page.
buttons.nextLimit: You are already on the last page.

status.accountNotFound: The account name entered does not exist in the database.
